about_the_game:
Prepare for an electrifying first-person indie sci-fi experience, where you step into the shoes of a formidable Cyborg tasked with eradicating hordes of relentless zombies.

It all commenced with a desperate quest for employment. Little did I know, I'd be chosen to command a cutting-edge Cyborg...
And now, I stand here, the world's last hope.

Once a lowly Garbage Collector, you've been handpicked for a daring and groundbreaking experiment.
Picture yourself inhabiting the robust frame of a Cyborg, with your very consciousness at the helm.

Your mind is about to embark on a journey, transferred into the body of a mighty Cyborg, all in the name of answering the world's desperate call for assistance against the relentless zombie onslaught.

But before you can unleash your new Cyborg might, there's a small matter of collecting sufficient garbage to purchase your mechanical savior.

The inaugural Cyborg Core stands as humanity's vanguard against the relentless zombie horde.

"Garbage collection may seem like menial labor, and that's precisely why Cyborgs are employed for the task. When the abominable creatures lurking in the refuse began to mutate...

We forged 'The Zombie Obliterating Cyborg'."


The initial Cyborg Core serves as the primary bastion of defense against the perilous Zombies lurking amidst the heaps of garbage, concealed within the shadows of the sprawling Mega Cities.



You embark on your journey as a novice, your first 'thrilling' assignment being the collection of garbage and the battle against the smaller, pestilent creatures within the refuse.

As your earnings grow from recycling discarded materials, the opportunity to acquire superior, more potent, and faster weaponry arises. In due course, you can even attain a fresh, robust, and swift Cyborg frame.

Seize the moment, acquire it here and now, and become a member of the elite team within the inaugural Core.

In the not-so-distant future of 2035, your humble beginnings are as a Human Garbage Collector.


Commence your journey as an unassuming, feeble human, earning your keep by gathering packs of discarded waste. By mastering the art of recycling, you amass a substantial amount of gold.

With your newfound wealth, you have the means to procure superior, mightier weaponry or one of the three resplendent, potent, and commanding Cyborg incarnations.

The three Cyborgs



There are 5 weapons. A pipe and 4 different guns.
The Biggest Gun is a Fast-shooting, noisy, Large-clipped Mini-gun.
(Mini-Gun is bad at close-fighting, but from a distance you can move down Zombies, by the thousands.


Enhance your abilities, enabling you to handle larger loads of garbage, increase your agility, or sharpen your perception of details.

In the event that the Cyborg you command meets its demise, you'll seamlessly transition back to your human form.

For an interactive and cooperative experience, the game offers local split-screen Co-Op, allowing you and a friend to collaborate and conquer the challenges together. Together, you can journey through the game and complete it as a formidable duo.

highlighted.name: Thanks for Keep playing my Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: 4 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
